p: Fe-TiO 2 were prepared by adding a varying amount of FeCl 3·6H 2O into solution A, as described in Section 2.2, and other steps were repeated as per Section 2.2. In this experimental, 0.1351 g to 1.3510 g of FeCl 3·6H 2O were added to solution A; the molar ratios of Fe 3+ to Ti 4+ were 0.5%, 1.0%, 3%, 5%. The resulting Fe-TiO 2 nanoparticles were called 0.5%Fe-TiO 2, 1.0%Fe-TiO 2 et al.
